description: React component 'ModeDial' rendering a DSLR-like program/mode selection dial with interactive segments, labels, and visual rotation based on selected mode. Handles accessibility features and styling.

methods.name: ModeDial({ modes = ['AUTO', 'P', 'A', 'S', 'M'], value = 'AUTO', onChange, size = 56, ariaLabel = 'Program/Mode Dial', })
methods.description: Functional React component that renders an interactive mode dial with customizable modes, current value, size, and change handler.

methods.name: degToRad
methods.description: Helper function converting degrees to radians.

methods.name: polar
methods.description: Computes x, y coordinates on the dial's circle given a radius and angle in degrees.

ctags.name: ModeDial
ctags.signature: ({ modes = ['AUTO', 'P', 'A', 'S', 'M'], value = 'AUTO', onChange, size = 56, ariaLabel = 'Program/Mode Dial', })
